parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 1.0
parts.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 1.1
parts.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.1 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.1 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 2.0

The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 2.0
parts.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 2.0 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 2.1

The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 2.1
parts.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 2.1 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

parts.Name: SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit
parts.Description: The SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform SMRTbell library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb.

parts.Name: SMRTbell™ Asym Template Prep 1.0
parts.Description: Auxilliary kit for generating asymmetric templates, used in conjunction with template prep kit 1.0

parts.Name: SMRTbell™ HT Template Prep Kit
parts.Description: The SMRTbell HT Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform 96 automated SMRTbell non-size-selected library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb. Reagents come in 4 x 24 reaction sets.

parts.Name: SMRTbell™ Barcoded Adapter Prep-96
parts.Description: The SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Complete Prep Kit- 96 contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

parts.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.0
parts.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s).  (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

parts.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.1
parts.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s).  (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

parts.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.1
parts.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s).  (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

parts.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.2
parts.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s).  (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

parts.Name: Sequel™ DNA Internal Control 1.0
parts.Description: The Sequel DNA Internal Control 1.0 contains a fixed template of 2 kb length bound to Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 for use as an internal sequencing control. Reagent quantities provide spike-in controls for a minimum of 24 samples.

parts.Name: Sequel™ SMRT®Cell Control Complex 1.0
parts.Description: The Sequel SMRT Cell Control Complex 1.0 contains Lambda library DNA template sheared to a peak size of 2 kb and bound to Sequel Binding Kit 1.0. It acts as a complete Sequel SMRT Cell control.

parts.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M (4/Pack)
parts.Description: The Sequel SMRT Cell 1M (4/Pack) are nanofabricated consumables each patterned with 1,000,000 wells called zero-mode waveguides (ZMWs). They are packaged together in a streamlined 4 SMRT Cell format (4/tray). One SMRT Cell is utilized in each sequencing reaction, and experiments can be run in single or in batch mode, giving your projects a greater level of flexibility.

parts.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial External
parts.Description: Individual partial Pack containing 1 - 3 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

parts.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Full Internal
parts.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

parts.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial Internal
parts.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

parts.Name: Sequel™ OS Enzyme
parts.Description: OS Enzyme is currently packaged with the Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0.

parts.Name: Sequel™ SMRT®Cell Oil
parts.Description: SMRT®Cell Oil packaged in 2 mL tubes.
